pages.text: Generally considered the weakest of magics by witchcraft, witches generally consider these a worthless type of magic, only to be used by spell weavers and magicians, witches relying instead on more powerful magic dormant beneath the fabric of the world. $(br) $(br)They do however acknowledge the usefulness of such spells

when on a pinch, or for utility purposes. $(br) $(br)Therefore, witches do use certain spells designed to help them on their craft, such as 'blink', or 'entangled feets'. $(br) $(br)Being a direct alteration of the weave of magic, these spells are the easier to cast once a witch discovers the necessary magical words, only draining a portion of MP when doing so.

In order to discover the necessary wording required for each spell, a witch should look for them in parchments of old, scattered around the realms of minecraftia, found in long forgotten dungeons or on the hands of the evil that roams the night. When found, the witch would right click to learn the specific runic combination that identifies a particular effect.
